description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Chicken,Low fat
name: Chicken Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, cover the noodles with boiling water and leave for 10 minutes to rehydrate.
Shred the chicken and slice the snow peas, then place in a lidded plastic container.
Trim the carrot, peel into ribbons using a speed-peeler, then add to the container.
Deseed and slice or chop the capsicum, trim and shred the lettuce, then add to the container.
Refresh the noodles under cold running water, then drain really well and add to the container.
Sprinkle over the seeds and secure the lid.
Squeeze the lime juice into a small lidded pot, add the honey, soy sauce and 1/2 a teaspoon of oil, then pop the lid on.
To serve, pour the dressing over the salad and mix together.
